title: Resident creditor notice
context: ยง560:4-203 Resident creditor notice. Payment or delivery under section 560:4-201 may not be made if a resident creditor of the nonresident decedent has notified the debtor of the nonresident decedent or the person having possession of the personal property belonging to the nonresident decedent that the debt should not be paid nor the property delivered to the domiciliary foreign personal representative. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1]
